text: Saaar, we came here to study saar. We are being ragged saar. (Location F2 tv room)
author: Vipul Kumar Singh

text: Yaad hai maine tujhe muh mai diya tha, tujhe bohot mza bhi aaya tha. Kaha gye wo dinn
author: Vipul Kumar Singh

text: I gave you your pehchaan in IITK. Always remember me my son.
author: Vipul Kumar Singh
